removeFavoriteButton.unfavorite:
**Functional Purpose**: Confirmation text for removing a student from favorites
**UI Location**: Mentoring session, Favorite button (hover state)
**When Users See This**: When hovering over a favorited student's 'Favorited' button
**Technical Context**: This text is shown conditionally on hover.
**Current English**: "Unfavorite?"
removeFavoriteButton.favorited:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating a student is favorited
**UI Location**: Mentoring session, Favorite button
**When Users See This**: When a student has been marked as a favorite
**Technical Context**: Appears next to a star icon.
**Current English**: "Favorited"
addFavoriteButton.addToFavorites:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for adding a student to favorites
**UI Location**: Mentoring session, Add Favorite button
**When Users See This**: When a student is not yet marked as a favorite
**Technical Context**: Appears next to a plus icon.
**Current English**: "Add to favorites"
